0.2.0.name: language-gid
0.2.0.description: Language syntax highlight (grammar) rules for GiD problemtype files

readme:
# GiD language support in Atom

Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to GiD problemtype files in Atom.

Contributions are greatly appreciated. Please fork this repository and open a pull request to add snippets, make grammar tweaks, etc.
